$interpreted: Hyde: The scenery of Whistlewood Valley is quite spectacular, don't you think so, princess?
Angelia: I am sorry. I am not in the mood to chat right now...
Hyde: If you're worried about the captured Chieftain Crushfang and officer Sione, I personally think that you can be at ease.
Hyde: Crushfang is the leader of the Bears. It's extremely unlikely that Theodore kills him and risks eternal hostility with the Bears.
Hyde: As for Sione, keeping her alive allows him to keep the Aldric family in check. Therefore, they are safe, for now at least.
Angelia: Is that so? Then perhaps I can rest assured...
Hyde: The most important matter right now is that in our previous operation, it was very clear that Theodore knew about our strategy beforehand...
Angelia: So there are definitely Theodore's spies among the nobles who support me?
Hyde: How troublesome...if only we had some of Theodore's dirty little secrets to use against him, like threatening him with his illegitimate son...
Angelia: That's merely a rumor, isn't it? I've never heard anything about him having an affair...
Hyde: All rumors, more or less, have a tint of truth in them.
Hyde: Hm~ I was an orphan, and my age appears to be similar to the rumored illegitimate son. Is it possible that I'm...
Hyde: Wah!?
Angelia: Hyde!?
Hyde: ...Why now...?
Angelia: Too many of them. Hyde, can you run?
Hyde: No need for that. Help is on the way!
Angelia: Hyde, are you alright?
Hyde: ...No big deal. Just an old problem that comes back from time to time...
Angelia: By the way, how did you know that Headmaster Ceres and them were on their way?
Hyde: Because when my symptoms surface, I can see the future... if I said that, would you believe me?
Angelia: ...Judging by the fact that you can still crack a joke, you should be fine...
Angelia: Rest here first. I'll talk with the headmaster myself.
Charle: Elio, your mastery over runes and Soul Energy is getting better by the day.
Elio: Thank you, father. However, I'm still unable to master the gathering of high-level Soul Energy. Would you give me some advice?
Charle: That's professor Patrick's field of expertise. You should ask him during the lecture.
Charle: It has been a while, princess Angelia.
Elio: Princess!? You mean, Miss Angel here is...is princess Angelia of Kingdom of the Sun?
Charle: Since it was you who called me here, I believe there's no need to conceal your identity, is there?
Angelia: Then I'll cut to the chase; as princess of Kingdom of the Sun, I order the Rune Academy to assist me in defeating Theodore!

Charle: Apologies. Rune Academy is a neutral institution. 
It has always been throughout its history, and we have no intention to change that tradition now.
Angelia: I'm afraid that you are not in the position to turn down my request.
Charle: What happens if I do?
Angelia: You accompanied us during our little trip to the castle control room back then. Furthermore, if I leaked information about our meeting today,
Angelia: what do you think will happen to the Rune Academy once Theodore's done dealing with me?
Charle: ... Princess, it seems that you've changed quite a bit...
Angelia: Going through hardships, experiencing failure and betrayal, anyone will grow; not to mention that I'm the princess of a kingdom.
Elio: I have a suggestion that can give princess the help she needs while keeping father out of this. Are you interested?
Elio: People are joining Theodore's forces mainly because of the kingdom's conscription order.
Elio: Princess should do the exact same thing. This way, members of the Academy can decide themselves whether or not to follow princess.
Charle: ...As headmaster of the Academy, going to war is not something I want everyone to be passionate about...
Angelia: However, for both you and I, this doesn't seem like a bad idea. I accept this proposal,
Angelia: and I hope Headmaster Ceres can approve of the students' decisions as well.
Charle: I believe there's nothing left for us to discuss. We will take our leave.
Charle: Elio?

Model.Text: The scenery of Whistlewood Valley is quite spectacular, don't you think so, princess?
I am sorry. I am not in the mood to chat right now...
If you're worried about the captured Chieftain Crushfang and officer Sione, I personally think that you can be at ease.
Crushfang is the leader of the Bears. It's extremely unlikely that Theodore kills him and risks eternal hostility with the Bears.
As for Sione, keeping her alive allows him to keep the Aldric family in check. Therefore, they are safe, for now at least.
Is that so? Then perhaps I can rest assured...
The most important matter right now is that in our previous operation, it was very clear that Theodore knew about our strategy beforehand...
So there are definitely Theodore's spies among the nobles who support me?
How troublesome...if only we had some of Theodore's dirty little secrets to use against him, like threatening him with his illegitimate son...
That's merely a rumor, isn't it? I've never heard anything about him having an affair...
All rumors, more or less, have a tint of truth in them.
Hm~ I was an orphan, and my age appears to be similar to the rumored illegitimate son. Is it possible that I'm...
Wah!?
Hyde!?
...Why now...?
Too many of them. Hyde, can you run?
No need for that. Help is on the way!
Hyde, are you alright?
...No big deal. Just an old problem that comes back from time to time...
By the way, how did you know that Headmaster Ceres and them were on their way?
Because when my symptoms surface, I can see the future... if I said that, would you believe me?
...Judging by the fact that you can still crack a joke, you should be fine...
Rest here first. I'll talk with the headmaster myself.
Elio, your mastery over runes and Soul Energy is getting better by the day.
Thank you, father. However, I'm still unable to master the gathering of high-level Soul Energy. Would you give me some advice?
That's professor Patrick's field of expertise. You should ask him during the lecture.
It has been a while, princess Angelia.
Princess!? You mean, Miss Angel here is...is princess Angelia of Kingdom of the Sun?
Since it was you who called me here, I believe there's no need to conceal your identity, is there?
Then I'll cut to the chase; as princess of Kingdom of the Sun, I order the Rune Academy to assist me in defeating Theodore!

Apologies. Rune Academy is a neutral institution. 
It has always been throughout its history, and we have no intention to change that tradition now.
I'm afraid that you are not in the position to turn down my request.
What happens if I do?
You accompanied us during our little trip to the castle control room back then. Furthermore, if I leaked information about our meeting today,
what do you think will happen to the Rune Academy once Theodore's done dealing with me?
... Princess, it seems that you've changed quite a bit...
Going through hardships, experiencing failure and betrayal, anyone will grow; not to mention that I'm the princess of a kingdom.
I have a suggestion that can give princess the help she needs while keeping father out of this. Are you interested?
People are joining Theodore's forces mainly because of the kingdom's conscription order.
Princess should do the exact same thing. This way, members of the Academy can decide themselves whether or not to follow princess.
...As headmaster of the Academy, going to war is not something I want everyone to be passionate about...
However, for both you and I, this doesn't seem like a bad idea. I accept this proposal,
and I hope Headmaster Ceres can approve of the students' decisions as well.
I believe there's nothing left for us to discuss. We will take our leave.
Elio?
